text: Orroli (Arròlli, Arròli) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 2,267 people lived there. Its area is 75.59 km². It is 550 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Orroli
